alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Gallatin; Jefferson; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 1:17AM MST until January 19 at 3:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TUESDAY TO 3 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Meagher, Broadwater, Gallatin, Jefferson and Central and Southern Lewis and Clark Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM Tuesday to 3 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Broadwater; Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Gallatin; Jefferson; Meagher
